import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "./.css"; // same CSS from before, renamed for clarity export default function Marketplace() { const [modalOpen, setModalOpen] = useState(false); const [mediaType, setMediaType] = useState(""); const [mediaSrc, setMediaSrc] = useState(""); const [year, setYear] = useState(new Date().getFullYear()); const listings = [ { title: "Signed Trading Card", type: "image", media: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1512496015851-a90fb38ba796?w=800&q=60&auto=format&fit=crop", bid: 65, }, { title: "Collector's Figure (Video)", type: "video", media: "https://interactive-examples.mdn.mozilla.net/media/cc0-videos/flower.mp4", thumb: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1526178619097-0f1b9815b15d?w=800&q=60&auto=format&fit=crop", bid: 120, }, { title: "Autographed Jersey", type: "image", media: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1533473359331-0135ef1b58bf?w=1200&q=60&auto=format&fit=crop", bid: 220, }, ]; const openMedia = (type, src) => { setMediaType(type); setMediaSrc(src); setModalOpen(true); document.body.style.overflow = "hidden"; }; const closeModal = () => { setModalOpen(false); setMediaSrc(""); document.body.style.overflow = ""; }; useEffect(() => { setYear(new Date().getFullYear()); }, []); return (
